name: Dodge'n Dodge (Original)
description:
This is the original version of Dodge'n Dodge, my very first game.  

Dodge'N Dodge is a little game, where you have to control a rocket and dodge obstacles to survive !

(You can found the same game on itch by Travelly Studio, it's my old account.)

Here the upgraded version of this game: Dodge'n Dodge Deluxe Edition (Upgraded)
